Submodules¶

mlutils.metrics.general module¶

mlutils.metrics.general.calculate_metric_dict(predictions, true_values, metrics)¶

Calculates each given metric for given predictions and their true values.

Use case: in case of running multiple different experiments at the top of the file you can easily define your set of metrics and easily store them. If at a later point you decide to change your metrics you need only change a single dict

Parameters

  • predictions –

  • true_values –

  • metrics – dict with key-value pairs metric name-metric func that you want calculated. Each metric func should receive parameters (predictions, true_values)

mlutils.metrics.relative module¶

mlutils.metrics.weighted module¶

mlutils.metrics.weighted.apply_weighted_metric(series_metrics_df, weights, series_keys, metric_columns, new_columns_prefix='W')¶

Applies the given weights to per-series metrics that are already calculated.

Parameters

  • series_metrics_df (pd.DataFrame) – df containing results for a single model

  • weights (pd.DataFrame) – weights for each series metric

  • series_keys (list of str or a single str) – Columns which identify different series

  • metric_columns – columns names of each metric

Returns

weighted metric of metrics that have been calculated on individual series

mlutils.metrics.weighted.series_weights_by_mean(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, weight_column, series_keys)¶

Calculates weights of series identified by series_keys. Weights are determined by the mean value of each group

Parameters

  • df (pd.Dataframe) – Contains all series

  • weight_column (str) – Name of the column from which weights are calculated

  • series_keys (list of str or a single str) – Columns which identify different series

Returns

series indexed by series_keys with values corresponding to weights of that series

mlutils.metrics.weighted.series_weights_by_total(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, weight_column, series_keys)¶
Calculates weights of series identified by series_keys. Weights are calculated by weighted averaging of total sums

of each series

Parameters

  • df (pd.Dataframe) – Contains all series

  • weight_column (str) – Name of the column from which weights are calculated

  • series_keys (list of str or a single str) – Columns which identify different series

Returns

series indexed by series_keys with values corresponding to weights of that series

mlutils.metrics.weighted.series_weights_uniform(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, weight_column, series_keys)¶
Calculates weights of series identified by series_keys. Weights are set to standard uniform weights (standard mean

in other words)

Parameters

  • df (pd.Dataframe) – Contains all series

  • weight_column (str) – Name of the column from which weights are calculated

  • series_keys (list of str or a single str) – Columns which identify different series

Returns

series indexed by series_keys with values corresponding to weights of that series
